case_title: United States of America v. Horne
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Horne

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 102 months as to each count to run concurrently and concurrently to judgments in State Court for Manatee County Circuit Court Case Nos. 94-798F, 94-799F, 94-800F, 95-2473F. Court recommends confinement at Brooksville if at all practicabl e. Supervised Release 36 months on each count to run concurrently - standard conditions. Special Assessment .00 to be paid immediately. Defendant is remanded to custody of U.S. Marshal. JUDGMENT OF REVOCATION: 12/5/03; 30 days home detention and 50 hours of community service;
